newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RBNZ enters $28 mln of forex swaps in first week.
newsitem.headline: RBNZ enters $28 mln of forex swaps in first week.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of New Zealand said on Friday it entered into NZ$28 million of foreign exchange investment swaps this week in its first foray into the swaps market.
The bank announced in September it planned to start using swaps to help smooth liquidity flows, but did not expect this to have any impact on monetary policy or the New Zealand dollar.
